info.description: This is the API for the DSA Backend application.
info.title: DSA Backend API

patch.description: Activate a user by setting their DisabledAt to a future date.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

patch.description: Archive a user by setting their DisabledAt to the current time.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

patch.description: Modify user details such as name, password, email, and role.

parameters.description: User ID of the user to be modified
parameters.name: user_id

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

post.description: Register a new user with the provided details.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users with their details.

put.description: Create a new lecture entry, accessible by manager and admin.

post.description: Register a new problem associated with a lecture

delete.description: Delete an existing lecture entry, accessible by manager and admin.
delete a problem entry by lecture ID and problem ID

patch.description: Update an existing lecture entry, accessible by manager and admin.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific problem within a lecture.
get all lecture entries, each containing its problem entries. When you don't have scopes "grading" or "admin", you will only see lecture entries that are published.
get.summary: list all problem entry, nested in lecture entry.

get.description: Get a list of required files for each lecture, including problem-specific files and a report template.
get.summary: List required files for each lecture

post.description: This endpoint allows instructors to request grading for all problems in a specific lecture entry in a single request.
post.summary: Request batched grading requests for all problems in a specific lecture entry.

parameters.description: Zip file containing all files user submitted
parameters.name: zipfile

404.description: No problems found for the given lecture ID

post.description: request a grading request, which is compiling program codes, and executes all test cases. note that the submission timestamp is specified by the user (manager or admin), and the target user ID (e.g., student) is also specified by the user.

get.description: List grading results for a specific lecture.
get.summary: List Grading Results for a Specific Lecture

parameters.description: The ID of the lecture to retrieve grading results for.
parameters.name: lectureid

500.description: Failed to get user list"	"Failed to get grading results"	"Failed to get lecture info"	"Inconsistent data: user not found"	"Inconsistent data: user not found in detail assembly

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific grading result.

500.description: Failed to get grading result"	"Failed to get lecture info"	"Failed to get problem info"	"Inconsistent data: user info missing"	"File location not found"	"Failed to fetch uploaded files"	"Failed to read build stdout"	"Failed to read build stderr"	"Failed to read judge stdout"	"Failed to read judge stderr

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific validation result.

500.description: Failed to get validation result"	"File location not found"	"Failed to fetch uploaded files"	"Failed to read build stdout"	"Failed to read build stderr"	"Failed to read judge stdout"	"Failed to read judge stderr

get.description: List validation results (not detailed, just summary) for the current user.
get.summary: List Validation Results for Current User

parameters.description: The anchor ID received in the previous request.
parameters.name: anchor

parameters.description: The direction to fetch results. Use 'next' to get older results and 'prev' to get newer results.
parameters.name: direction

500.description: Failed to get lecture entries"	"Failed to get validation results

get.description: Get summary information about a specific validation result.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to request validation for all problems within a specific lecture.
post.summary: Request validation for all problems in a specific lecture entry.

parameters.description: Zip file containing all program codes you're submitting
parameters.name: zipfile

404.description: No problems found for the given lecture ID

500.description: Failed to register batch validation requests

post.description: request a validation request, which is just compiling program codes, and executes some simple test cases.
User login with user ID and password. Returns a JWT token if successful.

200.description: Login successful. Returns a JWT token.

400.description: Bad request. This error occurs if the user ID or password is missing or incorrect.

500.description: Internal server error. This error occurs if there is an issue with the database or password hashing.

post.description: Logout user and invalidate JWT token

get.description: Get current user information from JWT token

access_token.description: DO NOT modify json name, 'access_token' is required in Swagger UI

token_type.description: DO NOT modify json name, 'token_type' is required in Swagger UI

data.description: base64 encoded data, compressed by gzip

scopes.admin: Grants any rights related to admin user
scopes.manager: Grants any rights related to manager user
scopes.me: Grants any rights related to the current user
